name: keycloak-poc
description: Goals: - 2 interconnected apps + API Gateway + Keycloak instance   - Keycloak instance, use federated identity provider concept (login using IdP info external to keycloak instance)   - Relying party, in this case a simulated monolith that will also be the IdP   - Resource server, in this case an API that accepts JWT generated by keycloak, simulating an internal microservice - Reference tokens
